project_descr: Integrated Landscape Management to Enhance Food Security and Ecosystem Resilience (PPG) Key government institutions are able to plan, implement and monitor priority climate change mitigation and adaptation

outputs.output_descr: The PPG project objective is all key government institutions at federal and regional levels are able to plan, implement and monitor priority climate change mitigation and adaptation actions and sustainable natural resource management

document_name: Recruitment of International Consultant to provide prioritized support to the CRGE Facility
Recruitment of National Individual Consultant to undertake base line study on monitoring of ecosystem services and global environmental benefits.
Recruitment of National Individual Consultant to undertake study on exploring mechanisms to integrate pastoral and agro-pastoral systems to landscape management (For Ethiopian National Only).
project_title: integrated landscape management to enhance food security
